Body:
net = op.network.Cubic(shape=[1, 3, 3])
assert net.Np == 9
assert net.Nt == 12
op.topotools.subdivide(net, pores=4, shape=[1, 5, 5], labels='blah')
assert net.pores('blah').size == 25
assert net.throats('blah').size == 40 + 5 * 4
assert net.Np == 9 - 1 + 25
assert net.Nt == 12 - 4 + 40 + 5 * 4
